medical_history.chief_complaint: 12 hours of epigastric and right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started at 4 AM this morning and is somewhat improved but has not gone away completely. Accompanied by initial nausea and one episode of nonbilious emesis. The patient had a meal of salad and chicken last night. Denies fevers/chills, chest pain, shortness of breath, diarrhea, or constipation.
medical_history.family_history: Father with coronary artery disease (CAD), grandmother with metastatic lung cancer, grandfather with emphysema.
